treatment.description: Stem rounded-pentagonal in section. Leaves flattened, lanceolate, distal margins plane, entire or weakly toothed, not bordered; apex acute, plane or keeled; basal cells differentiated across leaf base as a U or V, commonly running up margins, not distinctly enlarged submarginally; distal laminal cells pluripapillose with low papillae; mucro conic, of 3–6 cells. Sexual condition dioicous. Peristome teeth bluntly lanceolate.
treatment.global_distribution: widely distributed in temperate and high-elevation tropical areas of the world
treatment.discussion: 1. Multicellular gemmae on rhizoids from adaxial surface of the costa or in soil
